name: CowboyWisdom
0:
”Alexa, ask Old West wisdom”
”Alexa, ask Old West for help”
”Alexa, tell Old West to say something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: old west
des:
Common sense and uncommon genius from the old west! When the going gets rough, look to the advice of some of the toughest, most self-reliant, independent and free cowpunchers there ever were. Much of this ancient cowboy wisdom still rings true in modern life and provides some uplifting, fun sayings whenever you need a boost. As Bobby Bare once said: "Today, being a cowboy is more an attitude than an occupation." A slice of Americana for modern times carrying over the code of the west!

To get a random saying, just ask Alexa to "open old west" or "ask old west for wisdom" or "ask old west to say something"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
